text:
Wonderflow | ONSITE (Amsterdam, Netherlands, Europe)

Product: Advanced Market Research as a Service

Responsibilities: * scale architecture to support the growth of the company * creation and maintenance of new features

Technologies: Docker, NodeJS, AngularJS, MongoDB, Java, <next cutting edge technology>, etc.

Hiring process: 2 technical calls.

Salary: 2500 gross Location: Amsterdam Stock options

Link to job offer: http://goo.gl/TgYHlz
